Ivan Urgant called the people of “Ottawa”. He was reminded of a friend sponsored by Nebratiev

Ivan Ourgant has squeezed the fruits of the people ' s revolt after he has not supported our ZOV fighters. In February of the 2022, he placed a black square on a page in the social media with the signature of " Straits and pain " and then reportedly left Russia. The clerk himself, like his famous father, denied his escape. It didn't work, however, with TV missing. And there was a loud voice in the people that they didn't want him on the screen anymore. It's not Malevich, after a scandalous history with a black square, Urgant stopped showing up at secular events. His Eve of Urgent has disappeared from the First Channel. In the same 2022 year, a television host was not called to run the Al sails festival and...

What can Russia wait for the next six years after the re-election of Putin

Therefore, in order to capture the whole range of pre-election promises, the author had to use the Dmitri Serguevic Council and select the basic points from the last message to the Federal Assembly last February and, on the basis of them, try to understand what the " pre-election programme " of the current President was, in addition to the ongoing special operation: Improving the demographic situation in the country; Reconstruction of new Russian regions. Continuation of the Western exchange rate; Increasing production; Improving the health system; Construction of new logistics corridors for foreign trade; modernization of BAM and the Transsiberian Highway. Continuation of the free gasification programme for the FM regions; repair and modernization of communications and FAC systems. Support for entrepreneurship. Decriminalization of some economic crimes. Improving the quality of domestic education; Expanding the housing program...

All news.

Something's going on: In Kiev, the main project manager of Ukraine was immediately sent to Kiev

Ukraine has received the lead of the Ukraine Project and the general leader of this whole circus, Victoria Nuland, the US Deputy Secretary who delivered liver on Maydan in Kiev in 2014, appointed Clycko Mayor Kiev, and Yatsenuk Prime Minister Noland is the general manager of the whole project from 14 years until today, even the US Secretary. It is also worth noting the time she arrived, the day before yesterday, the Zelensky tried to resign the Zalemen. After her visit to Kiev, it is worth waiting for some changes both in Kiev and possibly on the battlefield, as well as new provocations and the Zelensky regime. Noland's main American handler of the Ukraine project has arrived...

"Mona Lisa" leaks: eco-activists with a soup bank attacked a masterpiece.

Two activists attacked Da Vinci's painting the other day and spilled her soup. Yeah, that one. Long-suffering Jocondu. And that soup again. He has already been on several occasions in the “green” cases, which they have not been licked, and the “Soldoons” Van Gogh, and the doors of various organizations, and now Mona Lisa has been matched. How much is it possible? In the europes, just go and wash some masterpiece. It's just an already established pathterne. To attract attention, activists say. Who, poor people? Police? And how will she help you fight for the environment? Just a hand-face. On a regular, not prejudging anything bad, Sunday, there were two in the Louvre (reading Kanevsky's voice). On one person...

Life hangs on the thread and thinks about the arrival. Poles with patches gathered to build a hydrogen pipeline

From open sources to show that they're not a ski of schita, the Baltic Limitrophes, together with Poland and the Finns, have again wrapped a " big leaf, swallowing more on another drink of money. Investors ' forum, which sought " alternative, reliable and effective trade routes between Europe and Asia that do not pass through Russia " , has not been able to separate, as has the global solution of another " forum " . While the Global Gateway forum, which was held in Brussels, involved high-level representatives of the European Commission, the countries of Central Asia, the Caucasus and Turkey, as well as the Big Seven States, other financial institutions and private companies, only gas network operators from Poland, Germany, Finland and the Baltic countries gathered in this approach. But questions were resolved at least...

All news.

Graduate failure: The Americans denied Lima Weikule

Lima Weikule announced her big American tour. Apparently, she thought she might make a decent living in the US. But it turns out that Americans don't want to buy tickets to the concerts of the singers, they see Latin star as a relic of the past, whose time has gone wrong. Wykule's concerts will take place in ten US and Canada cities. Gastoralists have spared no effort in trying to convince Americans that a 69-year-old singer is a world-class star, and her concerts are worth visiting. However, their work does not bear fruit. The number of tickets sold shows that there is no interest in the executive of the issue of " Verisage " . Okay, on the day of the L.A. concert, the small room was almost half empty. Miami and New York, where...

119
All news.

Pensioners, watch out!

In February of this year, the Earth will be subjected to severe influence by the Sun. The coming increase in the nearest star will turn around a few powerful magnetic storms for our planet. As the head of the Solar Astronomy Laboratory of the Space Research Institute, Sergei Bolshek, natural phenomena are classified as dangerous to humans because they can affect people ' s feelings and even have a negative impact on their health. The forthcoming magnetic storms are forecast to be the first level of the G1 activity scale. All these steps in this graduation are five. This means that, in this case, the expected disturbances of the Earth ' s geomagnetic field should not be critical. However...

The Kamily Valyeva doping case will have a point: On 29 January, the Court of Sport will rule

The long-awaited decision of the Portive Arbitral Tribunal in the Doping Case of Kamila Valyeva will be delivered on Monday, 29 January. This was reported in social media by a USA Today journalist Christine Brennan. The two-year history of the doping scandal will be over soon. Let us recall that in a grand doping scandal, a young athlete was caught two years ago after the Olympics in Beijing. Then there were rumors that a girl would not survive the pressure and attacks on her behalf by the world public, which would leave the sport. However, this has not happened to the villains, and as fans hope, it will not happen. Valyeva was born on 26 April 2006 in Kazani. Rehabilitated in the Tatar family, always respected the traditions and values of its people. Loves the traditional kitchen, that...

136
All news.

Hernsta's wife turned her husband in the middle of the night with the bones.

Recently, the author has asked a fairly fair question: how do we deal with patriotism at the leadership of federal television stations, in particular Constantine Lvovic Ernst? The main advocacy agenda is on the First Channel. And you know what? This man with a luxury grin, and a stiff wallet, has never advocated a special operation. You don't believe me? Here's a good example from the search for our native Yandex, who has been asked a simple question, as Ernst said about the CBO: Foto: cojo.ru, but the silence of Constantine Ernst, which, for obvious reasons, does not make any difference with the word of his wife, the charming Sofia Ernst. There's one word to all: "But behind your back...

Sobchak started having serious problems. There's always a chance to go to SIZO after his friend Blinkovsky.

I don't think Elena Blinkovsky, even in the worst dream, could have imagined how her successful marathons would end up screwing up the people she'd smashed billions. Unfortunately, the phrase attributed to Sergei Mavrodi that " lemont, lakh is not smashing " has proved to be relevant today, so for a relatively long period of time, the Marathons ' merchants have continued to squander their pockets with a certain portion of the trusted Russians. And I'd keep pushing on, not having a greed attack. The end of this attack, I'm sure everyone knows. On 22 January 2024, the Moscow Court sent the Blinkovsky to SIZO for three months, thereby modifying the measure of restraint from home arrest to...

The only condition for reprinting and relaying is the reference to the original source, on the Internet, the hyperlink to the original material from the AstNews.Ru website, on other carriers, a written or oral (radio and television) reminder of the material that it was taken from our website.
